==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks

|name_1 = Bump
|desc_1 = Moves away and briefly '''inflates''' before shooting itself at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
|strat_1 = Staying close to the Anemo Slime will prevent it from attacking.

|name_2 = Fall Immunity
|desc_2 = When knocked off the ground, the Anemo Slime will '''inflate''' and flap its wings to slowly float down, making them unable to take fall DMG.

|name_3 = Inflated
|desc_3 = If the Anemo Slime takes DMG while inflated, it will be instantly defeated regardless of the amount of DMG dealt. However, it is still immune to {{Color|Anemo DMG}} in this state.
|file_3 = Anemo Slime Instant Defeat
|caption_3 = Instant Defeat
|strat_3 = Use a well-timed ranged or [[AoE]] attack to defeat the Anemo Slime instantly in this state.

|name_4 = Final Burst
|desc_4 = When defeated, releases a short burst of wind, [[Vacuum Field|pushing]] the player back slightly before dropping any collectible loot.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A small monster created by the coalescing of Anemo dispersed throughout nature.<br>It is able to float in the air due to the power of Anemo.|[[Archive]]}}
